verbs.description: [ARG0: pittsburgh synagogue massacre] [V: leaves] [ARG1: 11 dead] 6 wounded a shooter opened fire during a baby naming ceremony at a pittsburgh synagogue on saturday killing an unknown number of people and wounding six others including four police officers who dashed to the scene authorities said police said a suspect was in custody after the attack at the tree of life congregation in pittsburgh squirrel hill neighborhood a law enforcement official identified the suspect as robert bowers and said he is in his 40s the official was n't authorized to discuss an ongoing investigation and spoke to the associated press on condition of anonymity robert bowers attorney rabbi jeffrey myers trump n c pittsburgh post - gazette washington tree of life congregation marc levy squirrel hill chuck diamond gab tom wolfe fbi gene puskar associated press michael eisenberg murphysboro prime minister benjamin netanyahu chicago myron snider claudia lauer pittsburgh synagogue philadelphia illinois pittsburghs emergency services tree of life synagogue anti - defamation league michael kunzelman charlottesville wendell hissrich maryland czechoslovakia jonathan greenblatt bob jones israel allen g breed scott brady pittsburgh new york city u s virginia director harrisburg assault synagogue chief executive officer paul leger president new light congregation jewish federation of greater pittsburgh president donald trump daniel leger donald trump gov tom wolf pennsylvania florida raleigh bower tree of life

pittsburgh synagogue massacre leaves 11 dead 6 [V: wounded] a shooter opened fire during a baby naming ceremony at a pittsburgh synagogue on saturday killing an unknown number of people and wounding six others including four police officers who dashed to the scene authorities said police said a suspect was in custody after the attack at the tree of life congregation in pittsburgh squirrel hill neighborhood a law enforcement official identified the suspect as robert bowers and said he is in his 40s the official was n't authorized to discuss an ongoing investigation and spoke to the associated press on condition of anonymity robert bowers attorney rabbi jeffrey myers trump n c pittsburgh post - gazette washington tree of life congregation marc levy squirrel hill chuck diamond gab tom wolfe fbi gene puskar associated press michael eisenberg murphysboro prime minister benjamin netanyahu chicago myron snider claudia lauer pittsburgh synagogue philadelphia illinois pittsburghs emergency services tree of life synagogue anti - defamation league michael kunzelman charlottesville wendell hissrich maryland czechoslovakia jonathan greenblatt bob jones israel allen g breed scott brady pittsburgh new york city u s virginia director harrisburg assault synagogue chief executive officer paul leger president new light congregation jewish federation of greater pittsburgh president donald trump daniel leger donald trump gov tom wolf pennsylvania florida raleigh bower tree of life

pittsburgh synagogue massacre leaves 11 dead 6 wounded [ARG0: a shooter] [V: opened] [ARG1: fire] [ARGM-TMP: during a baby naming ceremony at a pittsburgh synagogue] [ARGM-TMP: on saturday] [ARGM-ADV: killing an unknown number of people and wounding six others including four police officers who dashed to the scene] authorities said police said a suspect was in custody after the attack at the tree of life congregation in pittsburgh squirrel hill neighborhood a law enforcement official identified the suspect as robert bowers and said he is in his 40s the official was n't authorized to discuss an ongoing investigation and spoke to the associated press on condition of anonymity robert bowers attorney rabbi jeffrey myers trump n c pittsburgh post - gazette washington tree of life congregation marc levy squirrel hill chuck diamond gab tom wolfe fbi gene puskar associated press michael eisenberg murphysboro prime minister benjamin netanyahu chicago myron snider claudia lauer pittsburgh synagogue philadelphia illinois pittsburghs emergency services tree of life synagogue anti - defamation league michael kunzelman charlottesville wendell hissrich maryland czechoslovakia jonathan greenblatt bob jones israel allen g breed scott brady pittsburgh new york city u s virginia director harrisburg assault synagogue chief executive officer paul leger president new light congregation jewish federation of greater pittsburgh president donald trump daniel leger donald trump gov tom wolf pennsylvania florida raleigh bower tree of life

pittsburgh synagogue massacre leaves 11 dead 6 wounded [ARG0: a shooter] opened fire during a baby naming ceremony at a pittsburgh synagogue on saturday [V: killing] [ARG1: an unknown number of people] and wounding six others including four police officers who dashed to the scene authorities said police said a suspect was in custody after the attack at the tree of life congregation in pittsburgh squirrel hill neighborhood a law enforcement official identified the suspect as robert bowers and said he is in his 40s the official was n't authorized to discuss an ongoing investigation and spoke to the associated press on condition of anonymity robert bowers attorney rabbi jeffrey myers trump n c pittsburgh post - gazette washington tree of life congregation marc levy squirrel hill chuck diamond gab tom wolfe fbi gene puskar associated press michael eisenberg murphysboro prime minister benjamin netanyahu chicago myron snider claudia lauer pittsburgh synagogue philadelphia illinois pittsburghs emergency services tree of life synagogue anti - defamation league michael kunzelman charlottesville wendell hissrich maryland czechoslovakia jonathan greenblatt bob jones israel allen g breed scott brady pittsburgh new york city u s virginia director harrisburg assault synagogue chief executive officer paul leger president new light congregation jewish federation of greater pittsburgh president donald trump daniel leger donald trump gov tom wolf pennsylvania florida raleigh bower tree of life

pittsburgh synagogue massacre leaves 11 dead 6 wounded a shooter opened fire during a baby naming ceremony at a pittsburgh synagogue on saturday killing an unknown number of people and wounding six others including four police officers who dashed to the scene authorities said police said a suspect was in custody after the attack at the tree of life congregation in pittsburgh squirrel hill neighborhood a law enforcement official identified the suspect as robert bowers and said he is in his 40s the official was n't authorized to discuss an ongoing investigation and spoke to the associated press on condition of anonymity robert bowers attorney rabbi jeffrey myers trump n c pittsburgh post - gazette washington tree of life congregation marc levy squirrel hill chuck diamond gab tom wolfe fbi gene puskar [V: associated] [ARG1: press] michael eisenberg murphysboro prime minister benjamin netanyahu chicago myron snider claudia lauer pittsburgh synagogue philadelphia illinois pittsburghs emergency services tree of life synagogue anti - defamation league michael kunzelman charlottesville wendell hissrich maryland czechoslovakia jonathan greenblatt bob jones israel allen g breed scott brady pittsburgh new york city u s virginia director harrisburg assault synagogue chief executive officer paul leger president new light congregation jewish federation of greater pittsburgh president donald trump daniel leger donald trump gov tom wolf pennsylvania florida raleigh bower tree of life
